text: The Evangelical Lutheran Church in Thailand is a Lutheran denomination located in Thailand. It is a member of the Lutheran World Federation, which it joined in 1994. In 2018, this denomination saw its first women ordained into ministry, namely Jongkolnee Sampachanyanon Sim and Somporn Kulachote. ==References== == External links == *Lutheran World Federation listing Category:Lutheran denominations Category:Thailand stubs Category:Stub-Class Lutheranism articles Category:Lutheran World Federation members Category:Evangelical denominations in Asia Category:Lutheranism in Thailand
title: Evangelical Lutheran Church in Thailand
